title: USB BT Joystick Center 8 v8.0.7.apk
description:
After countless fake files I've finally found a working full version of USB/BT Joystick Center that doesn't crash every few minutes and doesn't check if it's legal when connected to internet.


Description from Google Store:

This app is NOT WORKING with all Devices and it's NOT WORKING with all ROMs you are using! The most problems are incompatibilities with ROMs with limited/changed USB/Bluetooth support.

- NO ROOT: You DON'T need ROOT for the "MAIN" App (USB/BT Joystick Center)
- ANDROID 4.2: has NO Wii REMOTE SUPPORT (limited by the new Bluetooth API)!
- YOU NEED: A Device with good "Full API USB Host" or Bluetooth Support.
- POSSIBLE SOLUTIONS: Try out a Custom Rom to fix Device Issues! (CyanogenMod Rom)

ABOUT this App:
With this app you can use "nearly" every USB Joystick/Gamepad and also some Wireless Joysticks. If you want to play Emulators like: C64,AMIGA,GBA,N64,DOSBox, ...) then this app is the right one for you. With the Joy2Touch Server App (*Root* required!) you can also playing touch only games like: ShadowGun, Modern Combat, Dead Trigger, Asphalt, Fifa, Minecraft, ...).

Features (USB/BT Joystick Center App):
- Support for some Wireless Joysticks (Sixaxis,X360,Moga,iCade,iControlPad,PhoneJoy,Wii Remote,Zeemote)
- Support for the most USB Joysticks
- Support for Keyboards
- Support for Xperia Play
- Create/Modify/Save/Load Settings (Buttons/Sticks/Sliders,Touch-Mappings)

Additional features with the "Joy2Touch Server" App (for this App you NEED ROOT!):
- Joystick->Touch Gaming
- Joystick->Mouse
- Wii-Remote IR Pointer -> Touch
- Mouse & Keyboard -> Touch

Supported Wireless Devices:
- PS3 Sixaxis Controller without root (* CSR BT 2.x/EDR+ USB Stick is required)
- X360 Controller (* "USB Wireless Gaming Receiver for PC" is required)
- Bluetooth Keyboards
- iCade
- iControlPad (SPP Mode)
- Moga Pocket
- PhoneJoy
- Wii Remotes 1-4 + Nunchuck + Classic (not possible with Android 4.2.x)
- Zeemote

* Please read the pairing help inside the app

Wired - USB (supported with default drivers, others you can create by yourself):
- PS3 Sixaxis
- X360 Controller - Wired
- Logitech (Rumble, F310, F710)
- Microsoft Sidewinder 2 Precision
- X360 Rockband: USB Guitars/Drums
- N64 "Controller Adapter for PC USB"
- PSX 1/2 "USB Gamepad Converter Dualschock"
- SNES "Controller Adapter for PC USB"
- C64/128/A600 "Keyrah" USB Keyboard Adapter
- PSX 1|2 "Super Dual Box Advanced" Adapter for PC
